Comment: Glenn Youngkin is really going to hurt the woman running this year. He was able to fool swing voters in a off year election, with them "I'm not maga" 2001 Republican who doesn't say the quiet parts out loud, but does them anyway schtick. I don't see the GOP candidate doing well at all, especially since she's a black woman, she's not going to get swing voters, and she's not going to turn out maga because she's obviously not the r(white)ight color.  Getting Virginia back under a Democratic Governor and winning other state seats would be a good morale booster, through all this shit.
Author: Shadow_Strike99

Comment: I hate that we have to win this way, but if we must.
Author: Rosebunse
